member.name: T:nanoFramework.Json.JsonConvert
member.summary: Provides methods for converting between .NET types and JSON types.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(System.Object)
member.summary: Convert an object to a JSON string.
member.param: The value to convert. Supported types are: Boolean, String, Byte, (U)Int16, (U)Int32, Float, Double, Decimal, Array, IDictionary, IEnumerable, Guid, Datetime, DictionaryEntry, Object and null.
member.returns: The JSON object as a string or null when the value type is not supported.
member.remarks: For objects, only public properties with getters are converted.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Json.JsonConvert.DeserializeObject(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Deserializes a Json string into an object.
member.param: The object type to convert to

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Json.JsonConvert.DeserializeObject(System.IO.Stream,System.Type)
member.summary: Deserializes a Json string into an object.
member.param: The object type to convert to

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Json.JsonConvert.DeserializeObject(Windows.Storage.Streams.DataReader,System.Type)
member.summary: Deserializes a Json string into an object.
member.param: The object type to convert to

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Json.DateTimeExtensions.FromiCalendar(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a vCal or iCal date string into a DateTime object.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Json.DateTimeExtensions.FromIso8601(System.String)
member.summary: Converts an ISO 8601 time/date format string, which is used by JSON and others, into a DateTime object.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Json.DateTimeExtensions.ToIso8601(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Converts a DateTime object into an ISO 8601 string. This version always returns the string in UTC format.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Json.DateTimeExtensions.TwoDigits(System.Int32)
member.summary: Ensures a two-digit number with leading zero if necessary.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Json.DateTimeExtensions.ThreeDigits(System.Int32)
member.summary: Ensures a three-digit number with leading zeros if necessary.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Json.DateTimeExtensions.ToASPNetAjax(System.DateTime)
member.summary: The ASP.NET Ajax team made up their own time date format for JSON strings, and it's explained in this article: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb299886.aspx Converts a DateTime to the ASP.NET Ajax JSON format.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Json.DateTimeExtensions.FromASPNetAjax(System.String)
member.summary: Converts an ASP.NET Ajaz JSON string to DateTime
